Projects

Secure Mini Monopoly

Transforming Monopoly into a secure, online multiplayer experience for an ISA/SWE - 681 course project involved leveraging Python, JavaScript, FastAPI, and MySQL. This version stands resilient against top OWASP and CWE vulnerabilities, ensuring user data protection. With an API designed to handle over a thousand daily interactions, the project delivers seamless, secure gameplay, featuring real-time updates and advanced authentication techniques for an enhanced user experience
